state_description: Initial screen of CleanMyMac X where users can start a system scan.

enables.name: Start Smart Scan
enables.description: Initiates a comprehensive scan of the Mac to clean system junk, detect malware, and optimize performance.

enables.name: Access System Junk
enables.description: Navigate to the System Junk module to clean unnecessary files and free up space.

enables.name: Access Malware Removal
enables.description: Navigate to the Malware Removal module to scan and remove potential threats.

enables.name: Access Privacy
enables.description: Navigate to the Privacy module to manage and erase traces of online activity.

enables.name: Access Optimization
enables.description: Navigate to the Optimization module to improve system performance.

enables.name: Access Maintenance
enables.description: Navigate to the Maintenance module for system upkeep tasks.

enables.name: Access Uninstaller
enables.description: Navigate to the Uninstaller module to remove applications without leftovers.

enables.name: Access Updater
enables.description: Navigate to the Updater module to update installed applications.

enables.name: Access Extensions
enables.description: Navigate to the Extensions module to manage browser and system extensions.

enables.name: Access Space Lens
enables.description: Navigate to the Space Lens module to visualize disk space usage.

enables.name: Access Large & Old Files
enables.description: Navigate to the Large & Old Files module to identify and remove large or outdated files.

enables.name: Access Shredder
enables.description: Navigate to the Shredder module to securely delete sensitive files.
